attributes.action: Take action to prevent the BBC from axing BBC 6music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For some time now BBC 6music has represented a large number of listeners who were disillusioned by mainstream radio. They supplied a mixture of quality alternative music and discussion in a market populated solely by mass market, generic popular music.

We, the masses, request gracefully that the Prime Minister, take action to prevent the cut or criticise the BBC for their failure to represent a market and an audience.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
